example.text: Three of the world's biggest oil companies posted record-breaking profits in the first three months of 2023. Chevron: $6.6 billion Exxon: $11.4 billion Shell: $9.6 billion Remember that next time they make excuses for raising prices on working families.
Today, I joined [[user]] to advance bipartisan railway safety legislation. We need stronger safety guidelines to avoid disasters like the one in East Palestine from happening again.

Update: My bill to combat the deadly drug Tranq just passed out of committee. Workers on the frontlines of this fight need better tools to respond effectively. This bill will invest in research and get resources where they need to go and protect our communities.
But can any of us look in a mirror and feel good about the use of that authority when the effect of that power as it is being used right now is just flat-out mean? It is mean to families.
Oil and natural gas production doesn't just harm the planet, it harms our health. Our transition to clean, renewable energy can't wait. [[url]]
Relieved to see a ceasefire called to stop the violence. Innocent Israelis and Palestinians are suffering. We must keep working toward peace. [[url]]
